selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Calculate the length of segment AC using the midpoint property.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the expression for the length of AC based on the midpoint property and calculate the numeric value.

selected_skills.name: map_value_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: Map the calculated length of AC to the given multiple-choice options.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the calculated length of AC and the provided options to find the corresponding option label.
